subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] It really might be easier to keep using e-mail
msgSnippet: ... From: Jon Zuck  Date: Friday, December 1, 2000 3:02 am Subject: [Read_Alphabet] It really might be easier to keep using e-mail ... I
messageBody:
Comments Below:

----- Original Message -----
From: Jon Zuck <frimmin@...>
Date: Friday, December 1, 2000 3:02 am
Subject: [Read_Alphabet] It really might be easier to keep using e-mail

> I didn't realize until I tried to use the Post Button that I can't
> post text in Revised Shaw from the newsgroup. It HAS to be done
> from
> e-mail to the newsgroup, anyway! Paige, Jayson, I think you've
> been
> encountered difficulties getting your e-mail programs to work with
> Rich Text (fonts, formatting, images, etc.)
>
> Please tell me what mail programs you use, and I'll try to
> troubleshoot.
>
--------
I actually use WebMail, but I might get a POP3 email thingy and use
Outlook Express.
--------
> BTW, go to Shavian to see a post I did titled "women." It's
> bi-alphabetal. I didn't realize that Jerome had italic capability!
>
> If I do say so myself, italic Jerome looks "frimmin'!"
--------
Yeah Windows automatically makes fonts Italicable. (NEW WORD???)
--------
>
> Jon Zuck
> http://surf.to/frimmin
>
>
